meanings.sent1: The goddamns cat knocked over my milk again!
meanings.sent2: She gave me a goddamns look when I accidentally bumped into her.
meanings.sent3: I can't find my keys, goddamns it!
meanings.sent4: The goddamns rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: The goddamns traffic made me late for work.

meanings.sent1: He goddamns the weather every time it rains.
meanings.sent2: She goddamns anyone who dares to challenge her authority.
meanings.sent3: I goddamns the toaster for burning my toast.
meanings.sent4: The coach goddamns the team for their poor performance.
meanings.sent5: The pirate captain goddamns the traitor to walk the plank.

meanings.sent1: She ran goddamns fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: He worked goddamns hard to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: I am goddamns tired after a long day at work.
meanings.sent4: The music was goddamns loud at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The storm was goddamns fierce, with howling winds.
